title: US Supreme Court upholds controversial Title 42 border policy
description: Invoked under the Trump administration, Title 42 uses public health as a justification for expelling asylum seekers.

title: Photos: Climate crisis threatens centuries-old oases in Morocco
description: Hundreds of people from the oasis areas have fled to the cities, mainly because of frequent droughts.

title: Russia bans oil sales to nations, firms complying with price cap
description: Moscow's response to the Western price cap is to stop supplying crude oil and oil products from February 1.

title: Leader in plot to kidnap US governor sentenced to 16 years

description: Autonomous vehicles from companies like Waymo and Cruise make inroads on California streets, despite safety concerns.

description: Kosovo has demanded barriers erected by Serb protesters be removed while Serbia has put its army on high alert.

title: Netanyahu closer to far-right Israel gov’t with new legislation
description: Amendments include revising ministerial fitness standards, meaning officials with suspended sentences can serve in gov't

description: A German research institute is tracking the funding flowing to Kyiv from its allies as Russia's offensive grinds on.

title: Ethiopian Airlines to resume flights into Tigray region
description: The flights resume as Tigray is reconnected to the national power grid and telecoms services are being restored there.

description: Reconstruction minister Kenya Akiba has been accused of violating election law and of ties with the Unification Church.

title: City of God, 20 years on
description: The Brazilian crime epic is more relevant today than ever before.

description: Every 30 hours, the pandemic spawned a new billionaire, while pushing a million people into poverty. Here's why.

title: Second boat with 185 Rohingya arrives in Indonesia’s Aceh
description: The boat came ashore in Ujong Pie village, a day after a wooden vessel with 57 Rohingya landed in another part of Aceh.
